page.title: 07LAMB-MARKETING, ST.ALLEN.
page.content: The farmers of Nancarrow & Killivose belong to a lamb-marketing group of almost 100 farmers between Mullion on the Lizard Peninsula & Camelford in N. Cornwall.The co-operative's directors negotiate with wholesalers for good prices on a steady supply of a fixed number of good lambs.A bonus is paid for consistent high quality & quantity.This benefits all involved_ farmers sell their lambs to the abattoir at optimum weight,wholesalers are assured of good quality, retailers benefit from guaranteed continuity of supplies.This marketing group deals with North Devon Meat,Torrington,& a family company in West Bromwich. The farmer at Treworgan co-operates with his son, a sheep-farmer in Devon, on a similar contracting system, supplying lambs to wholesalers in Exeter.
